topic.title: Katalon TestOps Definitions
topic.shortdesc: Name the ID in the following format: <product name>-<definition name>-definition. For example: ks-test-iteration-definition

body.p: Visual testing is an automated process that enables user interface (UI) testing of a web/mobile application to ensure that the software/application is represented to the end-users in the exact visual way it is intended to.
